system.description: A frigid globe of cold energy streaks to the chosen point and explodes in a 10-foot-radius burst, dealing 1d6 cold per caster level (max 15d6) to each creature; water elementals take 1d8 per level (max 15d8). If it strikes a body of water, it freezes the surface to 6 inches deep over 100 sq ft per caster level (max 1,500); ice lasts 1 round/level; trapped creatures need DC 25 Str or Escape Artist to break free. You can hold the charge (touch spell) for 1 round/level; if not fired, it bursts centered on you with no save.
